Lost and Found

1st floor library


Showers

Head to the KSU Rec Center and show your lanyard + badge. Towels are available in the lower level. See the bus info below.


Need Help?

Come to the 1st floor library.

Announcements

Join our Slack team for announcements. You can also post messages to get help or find other teammates.


How to Get Around Campus

There's several events during the hackathon that take place at verious locations around campus. While walking is always an option, the Kent State PARTA bus system is a great way to travel. Routes 53 and 58 will most likely be the ones you need. Use the Spot PARTA website below to help plan your trip. If you have any specific questions, check with someone in the 1st floor library.

Bus Route to the Rec Center (Showers)
Bus Route to SPARK Innovation Studio
